CFTRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Associate Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 17:44 IST
 Central Food Technological Research Institute
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 25,000 to 31,000




FOLLOW

Central Food Technological Research Institute (CFTRI) has announced the official notification for 2025. Allotted 02 vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.Sc, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Karnataka.

CFTRI Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Associate 	02	B.E/ B.Tech, M.Sc, Any Degree

Age Limit for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 31,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Register with your email and password.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	29-08-2025
Last Date of Application	04-09-2025
